page.title: 18ANTONINE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: In 1980 the Antonine Sports Centre was opened in the converted Laing's haulage yard and is now the main centre for sport and recretion in Clydebank.It's facitities concist of a large hall 100' by 80' divided by nets.The hall can be used for a variety of sports such as boxing, gymnstics,badminton,netball,basketball and volleyball. There are two annual events,a firework display and a fun run. At the moment the centre is trying to attract more women wo are able to use the facilities in the morning for trampolining,basketball and volleyball. The centre is run by a manager and a management committee who are at the moment planning an extention to this popular amenity.
